inventory.name: Quarterstaff
inventory.description: A sturdy wooden staff, suitable for both combat and as a walking aid.

inventory.name: Dagger
inventory.description: A small, sharp blade, ideal for quick strikes or throwing.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.description: You create three glowing darts of magical force that unerringly strike their targets.

spells.name: Psychic Damage

spells.name: Major Image
spells.description: You create an illusion of an object, creature, or scene, which seems completely real.
